law.catch_line: In addition to any other duties set forth elsewhere, the Office shall:...
law.text:
In addition to any other duties set forth elsewhere, the Office shall:
provide library and information services to the General Assembly and the general public;
index and preserve all information prepared as a result of the provisions of § 2-1238 of this subtitle; and
carry out any other function related to library and public information services required by the Executive Director.
